TopicTitle: Uncontrolled thrust while accelerating in map view

Articles.Content:
This issue has persisted for me between patches (v.0.1.1.0 & v0.1.2.0) and over several spacecraft.

When flying a space craft while accelerating in orbit (haven't tested in atmo) regardless of SAS and RCS being on/off space craft will lose control as it will either torque in some odd direction or there is some phantom force operating on it. This problem is not present outside of map view. I'll link a video of this in action, please note my hands are off the keyboard after switching to map view.

Operating System: Windows 10 Home 64-bit (10.0, Build 19045) (19041.vb_release.191206-1406)
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9900K CPU @ 3.60GHz (16 CPUs), ~3.6GHz
Card name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
Memory: 32768MB RAM
